ovdesc.p: This application is used to record requests for funds which require manual authorisation.

desc.p: The source product making the funds request.
Identifies the type of request.
Linked to EB.LOOKUP this is the code passed to AC.FUNDS.AUTHORISATION by the calling system.
Must have a valid code set up in EB.LOOKUP.
Description passed by the calling system describing the reason the request needs to be handled manually.
